Site previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2030.

The site has been subject to a bid to the HCA for Starter Homes funding and it was assumed that 40 dwellings could be delivered on the site. SiteNameAddress: Scott Road Garages, Scott Road, Kettering, NN16 9JY
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
PlanningHistory: At Planning Policy Committee on 05.09.17 it was agreed to designate this site as a draft housing allocation in the draft Part 2 Local plan for consultation with a potential yield of 25 dwellings. Potential housing allocation in Kettering Borough Council's Part 2 Local Plan. This site was included in the Draft Plan when it went to consultation in Summer 2018. Since this time a planning application (KET/2018/0799) for 22 dwellings has been received.  The target decision date for this application is 23rd January 2019 .                                                        .  https://www.kettering.gov.uk/planningApplication/128345
Notes:
Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 705.

Council owned site. Preference would be for affordable housing on site.

Different dwelling capaciites have been calculated for the site dependent on potential densities to be applied (taking account of the surrounding area). These entail either 17 houses at 50dph or 12 houses at 35 dph and these values take account (exclude) an area of the site under which a sewer easement runs.. A sewer easement crosses the site.

SiteNameAddress: Desborough Leisure Centre, Off Broadlands, Desborough, NN14 2YH
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
PlanningHistory:
Former Leisure Centre has been demolished. Site has been subject to an application for 304 dwellings (KET/2016/0044) albeit this was refused on 26/05/2016. An appeal was  lodged to this decision and the appeal was allowed granting outline planning permission on the site (APP/L2820/W/16/3162430). This site forms part of the planning application site, which extends further westwards towards Rothwell Road. 

Details are available here: https://www.kettering.gov.uk/planningApplication/122648
Notes:
For BFR assessment purposes it is assumed that development will only happen on the PDL element of site (and not the larger, wider site which includes extensive tracts of Greenfield). To derive these estimates it has been calculated that only 30% of the wider site is PDL so 70% of the overall site has been discounted for development, hence the minimum figure propsed of 46 net dwellings used.. KET/2016/0044 - Residential development up to 304 dwellings - Outline. Appeal allowed. (APP/L2820/W/16/3162430). Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 1165.

http://www.nnjpu.org.uk/publications/docdetail.asp?docid=1323

SiteNameAddress: Rockingham Dene, Rockingham Road, Kettering, NN16 9JW
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
PlanningHistory:
Outline consent for 9 dwellings exists on the land adjacent to this site (KET/2015/0220) but BFR K30 itself has no extant permission. Approval of reserved matters on the same land was approved 08/06/2018 (KET/2018/0257).

Site was previously occupied by a Children's Care Home which closed in July 2002 and was demolished thereafter. 

Site was subject to a previous application for 28 dwellings (KET/2007/0990) which Committee resolved to grant permission for (subject to S.106) albeit this was never completed and the application was disposed of by the Council in September 2012.

Details are available here:  https://www.kettering.gov.uk/planningApplication/127806
Notes:
See County Council map for additional details on features which may affect site:

http://maps.northamptonshire.gov.uk/. Tree Preservation Orders exist on the site (TPO 2008 No6).

Development here would support Town centre regeneration. 
The site is a long term site allocation in both the Adopted TCAAP and in the emerging Plan for the Borough of Wellingborough as Policy site TC9.
